name: Coop Chaos
description:
Coop Chaos

The chickens are out of control! Help restore order to the farm by throwing the chickens back into their respective coops. Once all chickens are safely stowed in their area, you win.

Controls

Keyboard & Mouse

W/A/S/D - Move

E - Open/close doors

Left mouse button (hold) (or spacebar) - Pick up & throw chickens

(Gamepads also supported - left stick, "X" to interact, "A" to pickup & throw).

Assets used:

  • Chicken - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/meshtint-free-chicken-mega-toon-series-151842
  • Fence - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/exterior/low-poly-fence-pack-61661
  • Main character - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/character-pack-free-sample-79870
  • UI Panel - https://kenney.itch.io/kenney-game-assets-3
  • Farm Buildings - https://quaternius.itch.io/lowpoly-farm-buildings

Sound effects sourced from https://www.zapsplat.com.
